UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Avian antimicrobial peptides: in vitro and in ovo characterization and protection from early chick mortality caused by yolk sac infection.
Literature.Author: Nguyen TTT, Allan B, Wheler C, Köster W, Gerdts V, Dar A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=1.5µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis LS101(MIC=1.5µM),Salmonella typhimurium SL1344(MIC=1.5µM),Campylobacter jejuni ATCC Cj1(MIC=0.75µM),Clostridium perfringens JP26(MIC=1.5µM)
